import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query inventory actions (GET)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves inventory actions using GET method with query parameters.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Supports the `SupportsCustomFilters` attribute for advanced filtering.

**Use Case**: Simple filtering via query parameters. For complex queries with paging and field projections, use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-actions) instead.

**Filter Parameters**:
- `ActionTypeId` - Filter by action type (consumption, addition, etc.)
- `InventoryItemId` - Filter by catalog item
- `InventoryId` - Filter by specific stock entry
- `EntityId` - Filter by related ticket or entity

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ActionTypeId","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter to actions of a specific type.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"InventoryItemId","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter to actions for a specific catalog item.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"InventoryId","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter to actions for a specific inventory stock record.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"EntityId","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter to actions related to a specific entity (e.g., ticket).","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"InventoryActionGroupKey","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Filter to actions belonging to a specific group key.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
